page.title: 06Our Weekends
page.content: For weekends many of us go out for trips in the area around the village . We go on bikes or in cars or we walk. It is easy to visit the seaside because we live so near. Lulworth Cove is only 5 miles away. Many families go shopping in Wareham, Poole,Dorchester or Bournemouth. Sometimes we go down to play at the swing park. Some boys go to a BMX cycle club and other children go horse riding. On Sundays many of us go to the Sunday school in the school hall. In fine weather we help our parents in the garden or go out for picnics. We are lucky to live in the village of Wool.
